ProteinName	Peptidyl-prolyl cis-trans isomerase A-like 4A (PPIase A-like 4A) (EC 5.2.1.8) (Chromosome one-amplified sequence 2) (COAS-2) (Cyclophilin homolog overexpressed in liver cancer)
GeneName	PPIAL4A COAS2 PPIAL4B
Length	164
Function	PPIases accelerate the folding of proteins. It catalyzes the cis-trans isomerization of proline imidic peptide bonds in oligopeptides (By similarity).
